string.text: I heard you can upgrade my weapons?
Let me see what I have got lying around. Yes, there are still some spare parts and addons for some guns:

Don't forget, no matter what parts I use, if your gun is a rusty pile of junk, you won't get a miracle out of it. And don't expect it to come out cheap, I'll still have to buy new parts later, this is not a charity here. For the work on your gun, you owe me another

, but you must bring your own tools.
Another one! I have nothing for your guns and never had, by God, I'm fed up! Go look for somebody else.
Okay, show me what kind of gun you brought here.
Okay, forget it, I have no money.
Well, that's it, and you were afraid. Hold on to your gun, everything's fine with it.
I don't have any weapons to upgrade with me.
I'll probably come see you later.
Okay, I got you, I'm already leaving.
Awesome, I'll come back when I fix it.
